original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2181)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2181)@</color>召喚一群神鳶，在長方形範圍內，交錯投下石彈，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2181)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2181)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2181)@</color> summons a group of divine kites to drop stone bullets staggeredly within the rectangle, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2181)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color>Inflict physical damage to the enemy.
